title: Incremental compilation panic due to unexpected OS termination

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Electricity was turned off during compilation and some files were corrupted ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.44.0-nightly (f509b26a7 2020-03-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: f509b26a7730d721ef87423a72b3fdf8724b4afa commit-date: 2020-03-18 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.44.0-nightly LLVM version: 9.0 ``` ### Error output
Backtrace when trying to compile again

``` Compiling dynmap-skin v0.1.0 (E:\ark0f\Programming\Rust\projects\dynmap-skin) thread '' panicked at 'assertion failed: value <= 0xFFFF_FF00', src\librustc_incremental\lib.rs:1:1 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fffd700975f - ::fmt::hd03123af32678204 1: 0x7fffd703645b - core::fmt::write::hd7e4da93b0f3f6cf 2: 0x7fffd6ff9fbc - ::fmt::hde06bc38d6d79e1b 3: 0x7fffd700ea0c - std::panicking::take_hook::h2d1d8b7f3a0f99f0 4: 0x7fffd700e65f - std::panicking::take_hook::h2d1d8b7f3a0f99f0 5: 0x7fffbf8dd28a - rustc_driver::report_ice::h81708fb20c592c8e 6: 0x7fffd700f2a8 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hc4844992c2f458f0 7: 0x7fffc25bfa5d - rustc_incremental::persist::load::load_query_result_cache::hf58b9a42073abd22 8: 0x7fffc261c8ca - ::fmt::hbcd1f24fc00e9f49 9: 0x7fffc25dd595 - rustc_incremental::persist::work_product::delete_workproduct_files::h060bb6b2fb4cabf1 10: 0x7fffc26176ad - rustc_incremental::persist::work_product::delete_workproduct_files::h060bb6b2fb4cabf1 11: 0x7fffc25bfd60 - rustc_incremental::persist::load::load_query_result_cache::hf58b9a42073abd22 12: 0x7fffd6fe8687 - ZN244_$LT$std..error..$LT$impl$u20$core..convert..From$LT$alloc..string..String$GT$$u20$for$u20$alloc..boxed..Box$LT$dyn$u20$std..error..Error$u2b$core..marker..Sync$u2b$core..marker..Send$GT$$GT$..from..StringError$u20$as$u20$core..fmt..Display$GT$3fmt17 13: 0x7fffd701e6cc - std::sys::windows::thread::Thread::new::hc81dbcd4d803919c 14: 0x7ff821f87bd4 - BaseThreadInitThunk 15: 0x7ff82284ced1 - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.44.0-nightly (f509b26a7 2020-03-18) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C linker=C:\msys64\mingw64\bin\lld-link.exe -C incremental -C target-feature=+crt-static -C link-arg=/debug:ghash -C link-arg=/lldsavetemps -C linker-flavor=lld-link -C debuginfo=1 -C save-temps --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack warning: could not decode incremental cache: Any Finished dev [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 16.22s Running `target\debug\dynmap-skin.exe` ```
